content: 3mm hook - make 2 - worked in row - chain at beg does not count as 1st stitch - turn on every row starting at head - 1 chain 2 turn single_crochet into second chain from hook 2 chain 1 turn increase 2 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet increase 3 4 chain 1 turn decrease single_crochet 2 5-19 chain 1 turn single_crochet 2 15r of 2 fo switch to body color 20 chain 1 single_crochet 2 2 21 chain 1 increase 2 4 22 chain 1 increase single_crochet 2 increase 6 23 chain 1 increase single_crochet 5 7 24 chain 1 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 3 8 25 chain 1 increase single_crochet 6 increase 10 26 chain 1 increase single_crochet 9 11 27 chain 1 increase single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 5 13 28 chain 1 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 3 15 29-30 chain 1 single_crochet across 15 31 chain 1 single_crochet 7 7 32 chain 1 decrease single_crochet 5 6 33 chain 1 single_crochet 4 decrease 5 34 chain 1 decrease single_crochet 3 4 35 chain 1 single_crochet 2 decrease 3 36 chain 1 decrease single_crochet 2 37 chain 1 decrease 1 fo attach with slip_stitch to opposite side 1 chain 1 single_crochet 7 7 2-7 repeat row 32-37 - fo line up pieces weave in ends and sew together using body color for body and neck color for neck/head face piece - make 1 in contrast color - 3mm hook 1 chain 2 single_crochet 1 2 chain 1 increase 2 3 chain 1 increase single_crochet 3 4 chain 1 single_crochet 2 increase 4 5 chain 1 increase single_crochet 3 5 6 chain 1 single_crochet 5 5 7 chain 1 decrease single_crochet 3 4 8 chain 1 single_crochet 4 4 9 chain 1 decrease single_crochet 2 3 10 chain 1 single_crochet 3 3 11 chain 1 decrease single_crochet 2 12-13 chain 1 single_crochet 2 2 14 chain 1 decrease 1 15 chain 1 single_crochet 1 fo use tail to sew to bottom front of guitar saddle - in neck color - 3mm hook 1 chain 5 turn single_crochet 4 2-3 chain 1 turn single_crochet 4 fo sew lengthwise to bottom end of body just above face plate use thread or embroidery floss for strings - you may need to add a couple of strands through the neck to help hold the strings in place strap - 3 5mm hook - leave 6-7 tails on each end 1 chain 37 turn single_crochet 36 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet 36 - fo sew to top of guitar near neck and to the lower middle side of the top v
